modalDescription: Please fill in the form fields below to set the values of the variables on this note.
triggerModal: Set the variable values on this note
noBlockFound: No Varinote block found on this note.
noActiveFile: No active file to trigger the modal for.
sliderFieldInvalid: Invalid configuration for {label}. Requires minimum, maximum, step, and default values.
sliderFieldInadequate: Inadequate configuration for {label}. Ensure min, max, step, and default are numeric.
sliderFieldOutOfRange: Default value for {label} is out of range.
